preference.name: CATIA_CE_EnvList
preference.preference_description: Names list of CE associated to environments

preference.name: CATIA_check_env
preference.preference_description: Manage or not multiple Catia environment Pssible values : NONE - Multiple CATIA environments and CATIA revisions are not managed REV - The CATIA version is only managed. The CATIA version and environment is written to the form during a Save operation. The CATIA version is written to the form during a Load operation. CATIA_CE_EnvList and CATIA_CE_Alias_xxx should be defined ENV - The CATIA version and environment are managed. The CATIA version and environment are written to the form during a Save operation. The CATIA version is written to the form during a Load operation. If a CATIA session does not exist, the environment written in the form of the root is used to launch CATIA with the correct environment. CATIA_CE_EnvList and CATIA_CE_Alias_xxx should be defined

preference.name: CATIA_customize_load_process
preference.preference_description: Determine which type of document (Part or Product) will be loaded in CATIA when an item or an item revision is selected 0 (or not 1) : the process analyzes the branches of the BOM tree, and stops when a node does not contain a valid CATIA BOM. In this case, cat_USER_has_children returns Answer=FALSE and the item is considered a leaf of the tree(component). 1 : the process analyzes the dataset types under the given item revision and checks whether the BOM View revision contains occurrences

preference.name: CATIA_credential_sharing_for_racless_connection
preference.preference_description: CATIA_credential_sharing_for_racless_connection

preference.name: AWC_TCIC_OpenSupportedTypes
preference.preference_description: Specifies for what object types the "Open in <CAD App>" command should be available for your CAD application.

preference.name: AWC_TCIC_ShowObjectDatasetTypes
preference.preference_description: Gives the list of dataset types, for which the default Active Workspace "Open" action should be overridden to open the object in CAD.

preference.name: CATIA_show_in_teamcenter_option
preference.preference_description: Determines which client the "Show in Teamcenter" command should open when the Teamcenter Integration for CATIA V5 Loader is connected to RACLess application and there is an AW client defined in the client_env file. Possible values: - AW : Open the selected item in Active Workspace. - LOADER: Open the selected item in TcIC Loader - DISPLAY : Displays a panel to select either the Active Workspace or Teamcenter Integration for CATIA Loader to open the selected item in.

preference.name: CATIA_auto_attach_to_3d_item
preference.preference_description: Drawing, process, analysis has the same item id and item rev id as the attached element or not

preference.name: CATIA_item_type
preference.preference_description: Define a list of item types to use when saving a part, product, drawing, process, analysis or design table, by setting the following variables within Teamcenter Preferences. The default value of the item type is determined as follows: If the item type is defined in the CATPART_item_type, CATPRODUCT_item_type, etc. preference, then the item type used is the first listed in the preference list. The Save Manager only displays the available (defined) item types. If the item type preference is not defined, a list of all item types available in Teamcenter displays, and the default item type is defined by the CATIA_item_type Teamcenter Preference. If this type is not available then the first item type in Teamcenter list is the default item type. When Create New is applied from the Save Manager, the displayed item type is the existing item type. If this type is not available, then default values are used.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_unmodifiable_attr_list
preference.preference_description: This preference defines an attribute list. These attributes will not be modified in the SaveManager. The attribute list must adhere to the naming format "keyword.attributename". List of keywords: - For item's attribute = Item. - For item revision's attribute = ItemRev. - For item master form's attribute = ItemMaster. - For item revision master form's attribute = ItemRevMaster. - For dataset's attribute = Dst. The attributename should be the attribute real name. For example: Item.item_id; ItemRev.item_revision_id; Dst.pubr_object_id; Dst.object_name

preference.name: CATPRODUCT_item_type
preference.preference_description: Define a list of item types to use when saving a part, product, drawing, process, analysis or design table, by setting the following variables within Teamcenter Preferences. The default value of the item type is determined as follows: If the item type is defined in the CATPART_item_type, CATPRODUCT_item_type, etc. preference, then the item type used is the first listed in the preference list. The Save Manager only displays the available (defined) item types. If the item type preference is not defined, a list of all item types available in Teamcenter displays, and the default item type is defined by the CATIA_item_type Teamcenter Preference. If this type is not available then the first item type in Teamcenter list is the default item type. When Create New is applied from the Save Manager, the displayed item type is the existing item type. If this type is not available, then default values are used.

preference.name: CATPART_item_type
preference.preference_description: Define a list of item types to use when saving a part, product, drawing, process, analysis or design table, by setting the following variables within Teamcenter Preferences. The default value of the item type is determined as follows: If the item type is defined in the CATPART_item_type, CATPRODUCT_item_type, etc. preference, then the item type used is the first listed in the preference list. The Save Manager only displays the available (defined) item types. If the item type preference is not defined, a list of all item types available in Teamcenter displays, and the default item type is defined by the CATIA_item_type Teamcenter Preference. If this type is not available then the first item type in Teamcenter list is the default item type. When Create New is applied from the Save Manager, the displayed item type is the existing item type. If this type is not available, then default values are used.

preference.name: CATDRAWING_item_type
preference.preference_description: Define a list of item types to use when saving a part, product, drawing, process, analysis or design table, by setting the following variables within Teamcenter Preferences. The default value of the item type is determined as follows: If the item type is defined in the CATPART_item_type, CATPRODUCT_item_type, etc. preference, then the item type used is the first listed in the preference list. The Save Manager only displays the available (defined) item types. If the item type preference is not defined, a list of all item types available in Teamcenter displays, and the default item type is defined by the CATIA_item_type Teamcenter Preference. If this type is not available then the first item type in Teamcenter list is the default item type. When Create New is applied from the Save Manager, the displayed item type is the existing item type. If this type is not available, then default values are used.

preference.name: CATIA_catalog_item_type
preference.preference_description: List of item types used when saving a catalog.

preference.name: CATIA_seed_drawing_id
preference.preference_description: Define the ID of an item for a seed document drawing

preference.name: CATIA_seed_part_id
preference.preference_description: Define the ID of an item for a seed document part

preference.name: CATIA_seed_process_id
preference.preference_description: Define the ID of an item for a seed document process

preference.name: CATIA_seed_product_id
preference.preference_description: Define the ID of an item for a seed document product

preference.name: CATIA_LoadUpdateSave_CheckinAfterUpdate
preference.preference_description: At the end of this process, each component saved will be checked into Teamcenter. If the variable is set to false, then each item saved will remain checked out at the end of process. The default value is true

preference.name: CATIA_activate_latestActiveShapes
preference.preference_description: Customize the activate latest active shapes setting used during the Load process. This value is modified when the Activate Latest Active Shape option in the CATIA (V5) menu is toggled on or off. The default value for this setting is 1

preference.name: CATIA_manage_configurations_on_load_from_CATIA
preference.preference_description: Manage configurations on open BOM windows during the Load from CATIA or Update Status processes. Possible values: - YES: Use Configuration defined in the dat file if it exists; else if Client_0 is running, use the opened BOM window and its corresponding configurations; else create a new BOM window using default configurations. - YES_BLOCKER: When Client_0 is running, use Configuration defined in the dat file if it exists; else use the opened BOM window and its corresponding configurations; else stop the process. When Client_0 is no running, use Configuration defined in the dat file if it exists; else create a new BOM window using default configurations. - NO: Create a new BOM window using default configurations. - NO_CONFIG: Create a new BOM window without any configurations. - TC_CONFIG: Use the opened BOM window and its corresponding configurations; else use Configuration defined in the dat file if it exists; else create a new BOM window with default configurations.

preference.name: CATIA_LoadUpdateSave_DrawingUpdate
preference.preference_description: Each Drawing that is linked to the selected component is also updated. However, if the Load/Update/Save process is performed on a dataset, only the dataset is updated. Linked Drawings are not updated when a Load/Update/Save process is performed on a dataset. Please see Rules and Conventions within the Load_Update_Save Process documentation for additional information. The default value is false

preference.name: CATIA_LoadUpdateSave_modified_file_option
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_LoadUpdateSave_modified_file_option preference to: - NONE to save modified files only (default value) or - ALL to save both modified and unmodified files or - PARENTS to only save both modified files and their parents hierarchy This preference has an interaction on the Load Update Save option in the CATIA V5 menus.

preference.name: CATIA_cico_ask_confirmation_action_from_ui
preference.preference_description: Controls the display of the Check-in/Check-out panel. Values: True: Display the Check-in / Check-out panel containing the OK button and require user interaction to start the action False: Prevents the Check-in/Check-out panel from being displayed and starts the action without user interaction, so users can not define Change ID and comments for a check-out action. The Check-in/Check-out panel displays if errors occur.

preference.name: CATIA_cache_managed_on_load
preference.preference_description: Manage cache or not during load process

preference.name: CATIA_cache_managed_on_save
preference.preference_description: Manage cache or not during save process

preference.name: CATIA_create_catia_properties_for_mapping
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_create_catia_properties_for_mapping variable to true to create non-standard CATIA properties corresponding to mappings if they are found. Set this variable to false to prevent non-standard CATIA properties corresponding to mappings from being created, even if they are found

preference.name: CATIA_MAP_Property_Nomenclature
preference.preference_description: Declare two Teamcenter attributes to define the Nomenclature and PartNumber properties in CATIA by setting the following variables within Teamcenter Preferences. CATIA_MAP_Property_Nomenclature= Dataset.object_name CATIA_MAP_Property_PartNumber= Item.object_name A blank line marks the end of the definition. In this example, dataset name (Dataset.object_name) defines a value of the Nomenclature property in CATIA and item name (Item.object_name) defines a value of the PartNumber property in CATIA. A list of attributes can be defined for both values to define their properties. Attribute values are separated by the value of theCATIA_reference_product_partnumber Teamcenter Preference. The attribute name corresponds to the Teamcenter Property Display Name which depends on Teamcenter localization.

preference.name: CATIA_MAP_Property_PartNumber
preference.preference_description: Declare two Teamcenter attributes to define the Nomenclature and PartNumber properties in CATIA by setting the following variables within Teamcenter Preferences. CATIA_MAP_Property_Nomenclature= Dataset.object_name CATIA_MAP_Property_PartNumber= Item.object_name A blank line marks the end of the definition. In this example, dataset name (Dataset.object_name) defines a value of the Nomenclature property in CATIA and item name (Item.object_name) defines a value of the PartNumber property in CATIA. A list of attributes can be defined for both values to define their properties. Attribute values are separated by the value of theCATIA_reference_product_partnumber Teamcenter Preference. The attribute name corresponds to the Teamcenter Property Display Name which depends on Teamcenter localization.

preference.name: CATIA_part_file_name_format
preference.preference_description: File name creation pattern for part and products Possible values : {0} - item id {1} - item rev id {2} - item rev name {3} - item type {4} - item rev description {5} - dataset name {6} - dataset type {7} - dataset description {8} - link type {9} - dataset uid

preference.name: CATIA_drawing_file_name_format
preference.preference_description: File name creation pattern for drawing Possible values : {0} - item id {1} - item rev id {2} - item rev name {3} - item type {4} - item rev description {5} - dataset name {6} - dataset type {7} - dataset description {8} - link type {9} - dataset uid

preference.name: CATIA_foreignfile_file_name_format
preference.preference_description: Specifies the filename format of foreign files Possible values : {0} - item id {1} - item rev id {2} - item rev name {3} - item type {4} - item rev description {5} - dataset name {6} - dataset type {7} - dataset description {8} - link type {9} - dataset uid

preference.name: SAVEMANAGER_always_displayed_on_save
preference.preference_description: Save Manager is displayed during Save process from CATIA whereas user interaction is not needed (true) or not (false)

preference.name: SAVEMANAGER_use_existing_item_revision
preference.preference_description: During Save mode USE EXISTING DATASET or USE EXSITING ITEM, latest revision of item has to be searched automatically in database(LATEST) or not (NONE)

preference.name: CATIA_checkIn_option
preference.preference_description: Use the following variable within Teamcenter Preferences to customize the toggle buttons of the Save Manager toolbar. Use the following variable within Teamcenter Preferences to customize the toggle buttons of the Save Manager toolbar. Customize the Compute Mass Properties button.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_unmodifiable_assigned_attr_list
preference.preference_description: This preference defines an attribute list. These attributes will not be modified once they are assigned in the SaveManager. The attribute list must adhere to the naming format "keyword.attributename". List of keywords: - For item's attribute = Item. - For item revision's attribute = ItemRev. - For item master form's attribute = ItemMaster. - For item revision master form's attribute = ItemRevMaster. - For dataset's attribute = Dst. The attributename should be the attribute real name. For example: Item.item_id; ItemRev.item_revision_id

preference.name: CATIA_createJT_option
preference.preference_description: Use the following variable within Teamcenter Preferences to customize the toggle buttons of the Save Manager toolbar. Customize the Create the JT button.

preference.name: CATIA_do_not_record_user_action
preference.preference_description: When the Create JT option has been changed in the Save Manager, set the CATIA_do_not_record_user_action preference to jt to reset the CATIA_createJT_option to its previous value after each save. This ensures that subsequent saves do not create a JT unnecessarily and the next save process executes with the value of CATIA_createJT_option.

preference.name: CATIA_do_not_deactivate_shapes_on_refresh
preference.preference_description: Do not maintain CATPart shapes deactivation on refresh. True: do not maintain CATPart shapes deactivation on refresh. False: legacy behavior

preference.name: CATIA_double_parameter_unit_conversion
preference.preference_description: Coefficient used to convert the units of measure between Teamcenter and CATIA for the values of the Double parameter : X value of Teamcenter = Conversion coefficient * X value of CATIA The default value, 1, is used when the preference does not exist, if it is empty or incorrect , no unit conversion is done

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_auto_assign_item_rev_ids
preference.preference_description: true = Manage auto-assign IDs during a Save selection in the Save Manager false = Do not manage auto-assign IDs during a Save selection in the Save Manager

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_auto_ids_option
preference.preference_description: True : Auto ids check box is toggled on False : Auto ids check box is toggled off By default the value is set to true.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_map_ir_item_id
preference.preference_description: Map item_id attribute diplayed in Item Revision section of Save Manager with any of CATIA property

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_map_ir_item_revision_id
preference.preference_description: Map item_revision attribute diplayed in Item Revision section of Save Manager with any of CATIA property

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_map_ir_object_desc
preference.preference_description: Map object_desc attribute diplayed in Item Revision section of Save Manager with any of CATIA property

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_map_ir_object_name
preference.preference_description: Map object_name attribute diplayed in Item Revision section of Save Manager with any of CATIA property

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_map_ir_object_type
preference.preference_description: Map object_type attribute diplayed in Item Revision section of Save Manager with any of CATIA property

preference.name: CATIA_ifs_catproduct_query
preference.preference_description: Customize the product query to define the query name. The default value is IFS_CATProduct_query.

preference.name: CATIA_ifs_catpart_query
preference.preference_description: Customize the part query to define the query name. The default value is IFS_CATPart_query

preference.name: CATIA_ifs_catdrawing_query
preference.preference_description: Customize the drawing query to define the query name. The default value is IFS_CATDrawing_query

preference.name: CATIA_ETS_catiav5tojtdirect_available
preference.preference_description: Manage JT conversion with ETS or not

preference.name: CATIA_convert_to_jt_with_product
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of additional elements managed when a product is converted to a JT. By default, only the product is converted. Possible values: ASR = convert product with its alternate shape representation. CSR = convert product with its component shape representation SP = convert product with its secondary parts and secondary products

preference.name: CATIA_ETS_translation_services
preference.preference_description: List of translation services

preference.name: CATIA_load_as_cgr
preference.preference_description: true = Load as Cgr menu option is active false = Load as Cgr menu is inactive

preference.name: CATIA_manage_load_as_cgr_with_components
preference.preference_description: Manage component cache during the Load as cgr and Replace Load as cgr processes (true) Manage dummy parts during the Load as cgr and Replace Load as cgr processes (false)

preference.name: CATIA_load_bom_traversal_option
preference.preference_description: Manages the Load level for a selected BOM Line (full depth, selected BOM Line and its direct children, selected BOM Line and its parents). Possible Values : THROUGH : the complete selected sub-assembly is exported, including all parents and all children. All children components of all sub-assemblies are exported recursively. FIRST_LEVEL : all parents and only the first level of its children components are exported. Children components of sub-assemblies are not exported.

preference.name: CATIA_load_unconfigured_displayed_bomlines
preference.preference_description: TRUE : all parts and products with Variant and Effectivity Conditions are loaded, when used in conjunction with the following menu options: All parts and products containing Effectivity Conditions are loaded when the Show Unconfigured by Occurrence Effectivity menu option is activated. Parts/products that do not contain Effectivity conditions will not be loaded and display a broken icon. All parts and products containing Variant Conditions are loaded when the Show Unconfigured Variants menu option is activated. Parts/products that do not contain Variant Conditions will not be loaded and display a broken icon. FALSE : parts and products containing Variant and Effectivity Conditions are never loaded and display a broken icon

preference.name: CATIA_update_drawing_before_saving
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_update_drawing_before_saving variable to true to update the drawing in CATIA during the Save process. Set this variable to false to prevent drawings from being updated in CATIA during the Save process.

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_save_aux_for_details_sheets
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_dwg_save_aux_for_details_sheets variable to true to save auxiliary files corresponding to Detail Sheets to Teamcenter. Set this variable to false to prevent auxiliary files corresponding to Detail Sheets from being saved to Teamcenter.

preference.name: CATIA_apply_post_action_on_revise
preference.preference_description: Apply or not Teamcenter Revise post action

preference.name: CATIA_apply_post_action_on_saveas
preference.preference_description: Apply or not Teamcenter SaveAs post action

preference.name: CATIA_apply_post_action_during_catia_revise
preference.preference_description: Apply or not Teamcenter Revise post action

preference.name: CATIA_apply_post_action_during_catia_saveas
preference.preference_description: Apply or not Teamcenter Saveas post action

preference.name: CATIA_createJT_option_for_import
preference.preference_description: true = Manage JT conversion during the Import process false = Do not manage JT conversion during the Import process

preference.name: CATIA_rename_drawing_dataset_in_post_action
preference.preference_description: Set to true to rename Drawing datasets during the Save As/Revise Post Action, set to false to not rename.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_display_item_attr_on_saveas
preference.preference_description: Display only the item revision's object_name and object_desc attributes in the Save Manager during the Save As mode (false). Display both the object_name and object_desc attributes of item and item revision in the Save Manager during the Save As mode (true).

preference.name: CATIA_apply_post_action_on_aux_datasets
preference.preference_description: Compute auxiliary datasets in Revise post action process and in Teamcenter Save As

preference.name: CATIA_apply_post_action_on_import_form
preference.preference_description: Manage Import Form or not in Revise post action process and in Teamcenter Save As.

preference.name: CATIA_apply_post_action_on_jt_datasets
preference.preference_description: Apply post-actions on JT datasets (True) Do not apply post-actions on JT datasets (False)

preference.name: CATIA_apply_post_action_on_ext_datasets
preference.preference_description: Apply post-actions on external files (True) Do not apply post-actions on external files (False)

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_auxiliary_types
preference.preference_description: List of drawing auxiliary file types

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_pdf_aux_dataset_type
preference.preference_description: CUSTOM preference for CATIA drawing PDF

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_pdf_aux_link_on_dataset
preference.preference_description: CUSTOM preference for CATIA drawing PDF

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_pdf_aux_link_on_item_rev
preference.preference_description: CUSTOM preference for CATIA drawing pdf

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_cgm_aux_dataset_type
preference.preference_description: ds type for cgm files

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_cgm_aux_link_on_dataset
preference.preference_description: link type between CATDrawing ds and CGM ds

preference.name: CATIA_dwg_cgm_aux_link_on_item_rev
preference.preference_description: link type between ItemRevision and CGM ds

preference.name: CATIA_manage_noncad_occurrence
preference.preference_description: Contains the list of BOM Line attributes real names to define a non-CAD occurrence This preference should only contain non-tag type attributes and only attributes that can be displayed in the Structure Manager. Tag attributes are ignored by the process when they are defined in the preference.

preference.name: CATIA_manage_noncad_part
preference.preference_description: Manage or not non-cad leaves of assembly in load process

preference.name: CATIA_manage_noncad_product
preference.preference_description: Manage or not non-cad nodes of assembly in load process

preference.name: CATIA_manage_flexibleAssy
preference.preference_description: Manage or not flexibility during load and save

preference.name: CATIA_default_folder_for_import
preference.preference_description: Defines the documents' import Teamcenter folder. Possible values : none, folder name (master value)

preference.name: COMMONcatiatojt_CATPart_ets_nr_types
preference.preference_description: The Catia V5 CATPart dataset named references necessary for translation. All named reference types specified by this preference must exist for a dataset of this type to be translated. If no named reference types are specified, no named reference type validation is performed.

preference.name: COMMONcatiatojt_ets_ds_types
preference.preference_description: COMMONcatiatojt_ets_ds_types: List of the dataset type names of the CATIA V5 datasets that can be translated into JT. If no dataset types are specified, no dataset type validation is performed. Additional named reference type validation can be configured for the datasets specified by this preference value.

preference.name: CATIA_display_asynchronized_datasets_on_co
preference.preference_description: CATIA_display_asynchronized_datasets_on_co: Gives warning message when a design with out of date visualization is loaded in CATIA and then checked out

preference.name: CATIA_auxiliary_files_printer_name
preference.preference_description: CATIA_auxiliary_files_printer_name: Specifies the Printer used for creation of auxiliary files

preference.name: CATIA_ETS_catiav5preview_available
preference.preference_description: Manage thumbnails with ETS or not

preference.name: CATIA_manage_thumbnails_on_save
preference.preference_description: Manage thumbnails with ETS or not

preference.name: CATIA_thumbnails_extraction_filetypes
preference.preference_description: Extensions list compatible with thumbnails extraction

preference.name: CATIA_thumbnails_store_file_in_source_vol
preference.preference_description: Specifies that Thumbnails visualization data files for a source dataset will be stored in the same volume as the associated source dataset data files. The default value is true. If the value of this property is set to false, visualization data files will be stored in the TS Proxy User default volume. The TS Proxy User MUST be granted access to all volumes where source dataset data files are stored unless the value of this property is false. This property must be specified such that it applies to all Services.

preference.name: CATIA_awhosted_display_loadmanager_on_open
preference.preference_description: Displays/hides the Load manager at the beginning of an Open in CATIA command from the Embedded Active Workspace.

preference.name: CATIA_display_unit_of_length
preference.preference_description: Length unit used for mass properties form display. The value must exist within the units.txt file, within the 'length' tags. If it does not, the default value is used

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_dynamiccrosshighlight_available
preference.preference_description: Enable the Dynamic Cross Highlight in the save process. Possible values: - TRUE = "Dynamic Cross Highlight" option is available - FALSE = The CATIA session is locked during the save process and the dynamic cross highlight is not supported.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_dynamiccrosshighlight_option
preference.preference_description: Toggle on/off the Dynamic Cross Highlight button in the Save Manager panel. Possible values: - TRUE = "Dynamic Cross Highlight" option is ON. - FALSE = "Dynamic Cross Highlight" option is OFF.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_hideshow_option
preference.preference_description: Manage Hide/Show assembly attributes outside the scene during the save process (True) Do Not manage Hide/Show assembly attributes outside the scene during the save process (False)

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_hideshow_option_on_import
preference.preference_description: Manage Hide/Show assembly attributes outside the scene during the import process (True) Do Not manage Hide/Show assembly attributes outside the scene during the import process (False)

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_process_template_filter
preference.preference_description: Retrieve all process templates (ALL) or retrieve only assigned templates (ASSIGNED)

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_process_template_under_construction
preference.preference_description: Retrieve all process templates (true), or retrieve all except "under construction" Templates (false)

preference.name: CATIA_save_mass_properties
preference.preference_description: Set the CATIA_save_mass_properties variable to true to read Mass Properties during the Save to Teamcenter process. Set this variable to false to prevent Mass Properties from being read during the Save to Teamcenter process.

preference.name: CATIA_display_unit_of_mass
preference.preference_description: Weight unit used for mass properties form display. The value must exist within the units.txt file, within the 'mass' tags. If it does not, the default value is used

preference.name: CATIA_display_unit_precision
preference.preference_description: Number of significant digits for mass properties form display (between 3 and 15)

preference.name: CATIA_computeGeometry_option
preference.preference_description: Use the following variable within Teamcenter Preferences to customize the toggle buttons of the Save Manager toolbar. Customize the Compute Mass Properties button.

preference.name: CATIA_int_parameter_unit_conversion
preference.preference_description: Coefficient used to convert the units of measure between Teamcenter and CATIA for the values of the Int parameter : X value of Teamcenter = Conversion coefficient * X value of CATIA The default value, 1, is used when the preference does not exist, if it is empty or incorrect , no unit conversion is done

preference.name: CATIA_ir_property_for_load_improvement
preference.preference_description: Allow to define property used to cache information

preference.name: CATIA_ignore_CATProduct_on_load
preference.preference_description: Defines the attribute (Boolean type) which determines whether the CATProduct dataset is exported during the load process (true/1 value of attribute) or if the CATProduct is ignored and replaced with a seed Product (false/0 value of attribute or no value).

preference.name: CATIA_AWcomponent_in_catia
preference.preference_description: Define the components displayed in the CATIA's tooltip and corresponding to the highlighted element preselected in CATIA. - Summary - Workflow

preference.name: CATIA_display_AWcomponent_in_catia
preference.preference_description: Define if AW component is displayed in CATIA. Possible values: - true: Tooltip AW is displayed in CATIA. - false: Tooltip AW is not displayed in CATIA.

preference.name: CATIA_occmapp_tcproperties
preference.preference_description: List all occurrences notes / BOM line attributes to use for mappings on instances.

preference.name: CATIA_occmapp_bl_ref_designator_catiaproperties
preference.preference_description: Defines mapping of Occurrence attribute bl_ref_designator to CATIA Instance

preference.name: CATIA_occmapp_bl_sequence_no_catiaproperties
preference.preference_description: Defines mapping of Occurrence attribute bl_sequence_no to CATIA Instance

preference.name: CATIA_force_update_instance_properties_for_occmapp
preference.preference_description: Indicates if CATIA instance properties should be updated for legacy data. Values: True: CATIA instance properties should be updated for legacy data False: CATIA instance properties should not be updated for legacy data

preference.name: CATIA_create_catia_instance_properties_for_occmapp
preference.preference_description: Indicates if CATIA instance property should be created if a mapping is defined on it. Values: True: CATIA instance property should be created False: CATIA instance properties should not be created

preference.name: CATIA_partnumber_separator
preference.preference_description: Use the Part Number Separator variable to define the separator used when building the part number; it is also used in CAA for the name of PDF files. This character is used as a separator to build the default reference name, i.e, ItemID_ItemRevID_ItemRevName.

preference.name: CATIA_part_file_name_format
preference.preference_description: File name creation pattern for part and products Possible values : {0} - item id {1} - item rev id {2} - item rev name {3} - item type {4} - item rev description {5} - dataset name {6} - dataset type {7} - dataset description {8} - link type {9} - dataset uid {10} - Multi-field Key

preference.name: CATIA_part_cgr_file_name_format
preference.preference_description: File name creation pattern for auxiliary file cgr

preference.name: CATIA_part_auxiliary_types
preference.preference_description: Auxiliary files list managed for parts

preference.name: CATIA_deactivate_update_reference_properties
preference.preference_description: Manages reference properties and shape representation updates for documents that do not match criteria defined by this preference. By default, reference properties and shape representations are updated for all documents. Possible values : NONE = Update reference properties and shape representations for all documents READ_ONLY = Do not update reference properties and shape representations for documents without write access. STATUS = Do not update reference properties and shape representations when the item revisions have a status. STATUS:xxx = Do not update reference properties and shape representations when the item revisions have a specific status. CATALOG_COMP = Do not update reference properties and shape representations for documents referenced in a catalog
